body: Wow my other thread got locked cause I said I was going on vacation and it's not <> personal that I'm going on vacation, I call <>, plus it was in <> OFF TOPIC FOR A <> REASON <>. Only seniors should be able to lock topics too.

replies.body: It is Off-Topic, yes, but that doesn't allow you to write about where you are going or what you're doing as it is listed in the ruleset to follow those instructions I had posted. Please be casual when writing discussions and if you have staff complaints, email support@avicus.net.

replies.body: You declaring that you're going on a vacation is about you, not a general discussion that isn't pertaining to your life. Also, you now have another locked thread. Please calm down and handle things professionally... and as always, post a suggestion in Server Feedback if you believe only seniors should be able to lock topics and email support@avicus.net with staff complaints. I do not want to dig this ditch further than what it already is, let it be.
